function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited understanding of disease leading to development of military cantonments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and impact on public health","Mitigation":"Incorporate expert knowledge and research on disease transmission into urban planning","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, disease modeling, urban planning software","People":"Colonial administration, military personnel, local population","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, researchers"},{"Description":"Reshaping of rural landscape creating ideal habitats for disease vectors","Impact":"Proliferation of disease vectors and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement effective drainage and water management systems to reduce mosquito breeding sites","Technologies":"Drainage infrastructure, water management systems, landscape design","People":"Local population, government authorities, environmental agencies","Owner":"Local government, environmental agencies, landscape designers"},{"Description":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on lower-caste Hindu population","Impact":"Economic and social disparity in access to healthcare and public health infrastructure","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of healthcare resources and targeted public health interventions","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics, community health mapping","People":"Lower-caste Hindu population, public health authorities, community leaders","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizations, government"}]}
